name: Last Wish
body:
## Last Wish

An open source Ultima Online RunUO Freeshard hoping to fulfill one last wish. Everyone is welcome!

### Three Steps to Join

1. Download and install [UO Client 7.0.15.1](<http://sourceforge.net/projects/ultimaonlineclient70151> "(Publish 51, June 15 2011)")
2. Download and install [Razor](http://www.uogamers.com/razor/)
3. Launch Razor and seutup: *Server: lastwish.servegame.com | Port: 2593*

![Razor](https://i.imgur.com/0fKB3TM.png)

### Source Code

You can download the shard source code [here](https://github.com/felladrin/last-wish), and run your own custom Last Wish server!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
